Name: Kara's Darkness Chapter One
About the game: Kara is a young girl whose life consists of nothing other than chores, studying, and boredom. Ever since Kara's mother passed away, Kara has been haunted by a mysterious darkness. Although this darkness is a bit mischievous and mean-spirited, she is Kara's only friend. Teaming up with the darkness is Kara's only hope in order to escape her father's grip and make it to Paradise Park. Immersive first-person exploration Originally composed soundtrack Full voice acting Unique blend of horror and adventure/puzzle-solving elements
